reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that the app collects personal information and provides details on how they handle the data, indicating a declaration of data collection.
reply.reference: We will only keep your personal information for as long as it is necessary for the purposes set out in this privacy notice. URL: https://bkinwrld.com/privacy

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects personal information for technological development, customer support, surveys, contests, and service delivery.

content: Categories of personal information collected include information related to customer support, surveys, contests, and service delivery.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions collecting personal information for specified purposes like customer support, surveys, and contests, which are essential for app operation.
reply.reference: We may also collect other personal information outside of these categories through instances where you interact with us in person, online, or by phone or mail in the context of: Receiving help through our customer support channels; Participation in customer surveys or contests; and Facilitation in the delivery of our Services and to respond to your inquiries. URL: https://bkinwrld.com/privacy

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: No specific declaration of the purpose of data collection and use is provided in the privacy policy document.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy does not explicitly mention the purpose of data collection and use, hence indicating a lack of detailed declaration in this regard.
reply.reference: No specific declaration of the purpose of data collection and use is provided in the privacy policy document. URL: https://bkinwrld.com/privacy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that users have the right to request deletion of their personal information, which indicates the ability to opt out of data collection or delete data.
reply.reference: Right to request deletion of the data â€” Request to delete You can ask for the deletion of your personal information. If you ask us to delete your personal information, we will respect your request and delete your personal information, subject to certain exceptions provided by law, such as (but not limited to) the exercise by another consumer of his or her right to free speech, our compliance requirements resulting from a legal obligation, or any processing that may be required to protect against illegal activities. URL: https://bkinwrld.com/privacy

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app may share data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that the app may disclose personal information with service providers pursuant to a written contract. This indicates that data sharing with third parties is a possibility.
reply.reference: We may disclose your personal information with our service providers pursuant to a written contract between us and each service provider. Each service provider is a for-profit entity that processes the information on our behalf. BKIN has not disclosed or sold any personal information to third parties for a business or commercial purpose in the preceding twelve (12) months. URL: https://bkinwrld.com/privacy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app does not share personal information with third parties for a business or commercial purpose. It only shares information with service providers under a written contract.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app does not disclose or sell personal information to third parties for business purposes. Instead, it shares information with service providers under specific contractual agreements.
reply.reference: BKIN has not disclosed or sold any personal information to third parties for a business or commercial purpose in the preceding twelve (12) months. BKIN will not sell personal information in the future belonging to website visitors, users, and other consumers. URL: https://bkinwrld.com/privacy
